post.description: Draft a new post, and optionally publish it

put.description: Update an entire post, including all contents

post.description: Attach additional content to a post

put.description: Edit the content of a post

post.description: Create a new profile that belongs to the given account
Add a custom field to the profile

delete.description: Remove a custom field from the profile

put.description: Update a custom field on the profile

get.description: Get the paged list of profiles followed by the given profile

put.description: Request to follow the followProfileId on a remote peer server

get.description: Get the paged list of profiles that follow the given profile

put.description: Accept a follow request from the followerProfileId

delete.description: Remove the followProfileId as a follower, or reject their follow request
Unblock the targetProfileId, and allow them to see and interact with you again

get.description: Get a new moderation report by ID

post.description: Add a remark to a moderation report

put.description: Close or reopen a moderation report

get.description: Get posts for the Profile's regular timeline feed

Bearer.description: Enter the Authorization header, including the Bearer scheme, like so: `Bearer <JWT>`
Bearer.name: Authorization
